Susan Hoffmann and I co-authored a paper on the history and evolution of the housing Government-Sponsored Enterprises -  Fannie Mae and Freddie Mac. We trace how the intersection of affordable housing policy, deregulation, and privatization ultimately caused the GSEs to fail.

[Click here](https://jkcorder.files.wordpress.com/2017/02/fanniefreddie.pdf) to read the paper.
